headline: Change Foods Secures Funding to Scale Animal-Free Dairy Production
summary: Change Foods receives investment to expand production of dairy alternatives using precision fermentation.

headline: Modern Meadow Partners with Textile Company for Bio-Based Material Distribution
summary: Modern Meadow collaborates to distribute its bio-fabricated materials, expanding its market reach.

headline: Solar Foods Announces Commercial Launch of Solein Protein Powder
summary: Solar Foods' Solein, a protein made from air, electricity, and microbes, becomes commercially available.

headline: Algiknit Raises Series A to Advance Seaweed-Based Yarn Production
summary: Algiknit secures funding to scale up production of its sustainable yarns made from seaweed.

headline: The EVERY Company Launches Animal-Free Egg White Protein for Food Manufacturers
summary: The EVERY Company introduces its egg white alternative produced through precision fermentation for B2B applications.

headline: Piñatex Expands Production Capacity to Meet Growing Demand
summary: Ananas Anam increases Piñatex output due to rising demand for its pineapple leaf-based leather alternative.

headline: Perfect Day Announces Partnership with Major Food Brand for Vegan Cheese Line
summary: Perfect Day collaborates with a leading food company to launch a new line of vegan cheese products.

headline: Mylo Mushroom Leather Featured in New Luxury Fashion Collection
summary: Mylo, Bolt Threads' mushroom leather alternative, is showcased in a high-end fashion line.

headline: Air Protein Opens Pilot Production Plant for Air-Based Meat Alternatives
summary: Air Protein inaugurates a pilot facility to produce meat alternatives using carbon transformation technology.

headline: Natural Fiber Welding Receives Investment for Mirum Material Production Scale-Up
summary: Natural Fiber Welding gains funding to expand production of Mirum, a plant-based leather alternative.
